sourcesContent:
import {
  Dialog,
  DialogTitle,
  DialogContent,
  DialogActions,
  Button,
  TextField,
  Grid,
} from '@mui/material';

const OrderForm = ({ open, onClose, formData, setFormData, onSubmit }) => {
  return (
    <Dialog open={open} onClose={onClose}>
      <DialogTitle>
        {formData._id ? 'Sửa đơn hàng' : 'Thêm đơn hàng'}
      </DialogTitle>
      <DialogContent>
        <Grid container spacing={2}>
          <Grid item xs={6}>
            <TextField
              autoFocus
              margin="dense"
              label="Tên khách hàng"
              fullWidth
              value={formData.shippingInfo?.fullName || ''}
              onChange={(e) => setFormData({ ...formData, shippingInfo: { ...formData.shippingInfo, fullName: e.target.value } })}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={6}>
            <TextField
              margin="dense"
              label="Email"
              fullWidth
              value={formData.shippingInfo?.email || ''}
              onChange={(e) => setFormData({ ...formData, shippingInfo: { ...formData.shippingInfo, email: e.target.value } })}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={6}>
            <TextField
              margin="dense"
              label="Số điện thoại"
              fullWidth
              value={formData.shippingInfo?.phone || ''}
              onChange={(e) => setFormData({ ...formData, shippingInfo: { ...formData.shippingInfo, phone: e.target.value } })}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={6}>
            <TextField
              margin="dense"
              label="Địa chỉ"
              fullWidth
              value={formData.shippingInfo?.address || ''}
              onChange={(e) => setFormData({ ...formData, shippingInfo: { ...formData.shippingInfo, address: e.target.value } })}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={6}>
            <TextField
              margin="dense"
              label="Trạng thái"
              fullWidth
              value={formData.status || ''}
              onChange={(e) => setFormData({ ...formData, status: e.target.value })}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={6}>
            <TextField
              margin="dense"
              label="Sản phẩm"
              fullWidth
              value={formData.items.map(item => item.name).join(', ') || ''}
              onChange={() => {}} // Disable editing for this field
            />
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </DialogContent>
      <DialogActions>
        <Button onClick={onClose}>Hủy</Button>
        <Button onClick={onSubmit} variant="contained">
          {formData._id ? 'Cập nhật' : 'Thêm'}
        </Button>
      </DialogActions>
    </Dialog>
  );
};

export default OrderForm;
